user_query: My Neighbor Totoro is directed by Hayao Miyazaki and I just got to see this in theaters there's a really cool new thing going on this year called Ghibli Fest fathom events is doing a special two night only run of various Studio Ghibli films and Totoro was the first one they showed it's a good excuse for me to finally review it because one of my goals for my channel is to have a review for every Studio Ghibli film ever made at some point in the future I'd like to have that accomplished it's going to take a while trust me but this year I'm going to try to knock out all the ones they're showing at Ghibli Fest despite the fact that I know many of you have seen this movie I'm also sure a lot of you haven't so I'm going to avoid spoilers in this review basically it's about two young girls and a father who moved to a rural Countryside in a new house and they explore the house and they make up stories about the fact that they think it's haunted and they use their imagination they're clearly two very happy go-lucky girls and their mother is in the hospital it's unclear exactly what she has there are small hints given towards what their mother's illness might be but it's never really clearly stated and it's clear as an adult watching this movie that these kids are using their imagination so much because they're trying to escape the fear that they have about whether or not their mother could die and eventually the youngest girl Mei while her sister is at school runs into a beast named

entities.entity_description: 이웃집 토토로는 시골로 이사한 두 어린 소녀와 아버지의 이야기를 다룬 스튜디오 지브리 애니메이션 영화이다
미야자키 하야오는 이웃집 토토로를 감독한 감독이다
메이는 영화의 막내 소녀로, 언니가 학교에 있는 동안 토토로라는 존재를 만나게 되는 캐릭터이다
스튜디오 지브리는 일본의 애니메이션 제작사로 다양한 영화를 제작했다
지브리 페스트는 파덤 이벤츠가 주최하는 스튜디오 지브리 영화들의 특별 상영 행사이다

relationships.relationship_description: 이웃집 토토로는 스튜디오 지브리에서 제작한 영화이다
이웃집 토토로는 지브리 페스트에서 첫 번째로 상영된 영화이다

MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO.description: MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO -> MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO
